Arm kinematics primarily based on Cartesian/linkage design.

All arms mounted on one mobile patient-side base.
Provides tactile or force cues to the operator, doesn't assume full force feedback.
End effector instruments include distal articulation (wrist).

Intended for non-endoscopic (open) surgical approaches.

No longer produced or clinically supported.

System separates arms across multiple bases.
Stereoscopic display (flat screen).

Monocular endoscopic imaging only.

Operator interface without enclosed immersive hood.
